articles.description: After a two-year break due the pandemic, the 35th Waterfront Blues Festival has returned to Portland’s Tom McCall Waterfront Park and is full force for the July Fourth weekend.
articles.content:
The Waterfront Blues Festival has returned after a pandemic-caused two-year hiatus.
This 35th edition of the event, which started Friday, will run for four days at Portlands Tom McCall Waterfront Pa… [+621 chars]
